title: MCCB
description: Maintenance activities for MCCB in LV SWGR system

body.raw:
# MCCB


## Timing

- Timing Open-Close
- Response Time


## Insulation

- Ins. Resist.
- Polarization Index


## Tripping

- Shunt Trip
- UV Trip
- Thermal Trip


## Mechanical

- Mech. Operation
- Contact Wear
- Contact Alignment
